error.title: Details not available
error.message: The details for this lecture are not available.

empty.title: Timetable not configured
empty.message: To display your timetable, you have to configure it using the THI timetable website.

filtered.title: No future lectures found
filtered.message: Looks like there are no more lectures this semester.

web.title: Not available on web
web.message: Download the app to view the details of this lecture.

notificatons.title: Notifications
notificatons.description: Receive notifications before this lecture starts. These repeat until you deactivate them here.
notificatons.active: Notifications enabled. You will be notified {{mins}} minutes before the lecture starts.
